SELECT AREA_ID, AREA_CODE, AREA_NAME, AREA_TYPE, SUPER_AREA_CODE pAreaCode, LEVEL, SEQ_NO, FINAL_FLAG, BUILDING_PURPOSE, BUILDING_CODE, ROOM_CODE, DOOR_CODE, ROOM_NO, ROOM_AREA, ACREAGE, PERIMETER, REMARK1 FROM tb_area WHERE 1 = 1
and (AREA_CODE = #{areaCode} OR SUPER_AREA_CODE = #{areaCode})
order by AREA_CODE,SEQ_NO
SELECT m.AREA_CODE areaCode, m.AREA_NAME areaName, m.SUPER_AREA_CODE pAreaCode, n.AREA_NAME pAreaName FROM tb_area m LEFT JOIN tb_area n ON m.SUPER_AREA_CODE = n.AREA_CODE
